content: g with the zai'thisk, insist on going before Lae'zel. Then, say, "You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance." When talking to Youth Varryl, convince him - either through Intimidation, Deception, or Persuasion - to give you the book about Orpheus. You bully. After obtaining the book from Youth Varryl, talk to Lae'zel about it. When talking to Kith'rak Therezzyn, tell her you have the relic, and agree to hand it over.
